product_name: Helly Hansen Pace Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For next-to-nothing comfort on your long runs, wear the women's lightweight, mesh-paneled Helly Hansen Pace Shorts and rejoice in their breathability. Lightweight, quick-drying polyester shell fabric has mesh insets for enhanced airflow. Inner mesh brief wicks moisture, dries fast and provides stay-in-place comfort as you run. Helly Hansen Pace Shorts have a zippered pocket at the center back. Closeout.
short_description: For next-to-nothing comfort on your long runs, wear the women's lightweight, mesh-paneled Helly Hansen Pace Shorts and rejoice in their breathability.
